tympanoplasty.context: The patient had tympanoplasty surgery for a traumatic perforation of the right ear about six weeks ago.

traumatic perforation.context: The patient had tympanoplasty surgery for a traumatic perforation of the right ear about six weeks ago.

six weeks ago.context: The patient had tympanoplasty surgery for a traumatic perforation of the right ear about six weeks ago.

bothering him.context: Mom called because his other ear was bothering him.

ringing.context: Earlier today, he said it was ringing and vibrating.

vibrating.context: Earlier today, he said it was ringing and vibrating.

cold.context: He has had a cold but it has not been severe.

ear discharge.context: There has been no ear discharge.

successful tympanoplasty.context: The right eardrum is intact showing a successful tympanoplasty.

wax.context: Also some wax at the external meatus I cleaned with a Q-tip with peroxide.

slightly red.context: The right eardrum might be very slightly red but not obviously infected.

infected.context: The right eardrum might be very slightly red but not obviously infected.

infection.context: The left eardrum (not the surgical ear) has a definite infection with a reddened bulging drum but no perforation or granulation tissue.

reddened bulging drum.context: The left eardrum (not the surgical ear) has a definite infection with a reddened bulging drum but no perforation or granulation tissue.

perforation.context: The left eardrum (not the surgical ear) has a definite infection with a reddened bulging drum but no perforation or granulation tissue.

granulation tissue.context: The left eardrum (not the surgical ear) has a definite infection with a reddened bulging drum but no perforation or granulation tissue.

medical allergies.context: The patient has no medical allergies.

Augmentin.context: Since he recently had a course of Omnicef we chose to put him on Augmentin (I checked and we did not have samples), so I phoned in a two-week course of Augmentin 400 mg chewable twice daily with food at Walgreens.

Omnicef.context: Since he recently had a course of Omnicef we chose to put him on Augmentin (I checked and we did not have samples), so I phoned in a two-week course of Augmentin 400 mg chewable twice daily with food at Walgreens.

clear throat.context: I looked at this throat which looks clear.

clear mucinous secretions.context: The nose only has a little clear mucinous secretions.

ear drainage.context: If there is any ear drainage, please use the Floxin drops.

Floxin drops.context: If there is any ear drainage, please use the Floxin drops.

residual infection.context: I asked Mom to have the family doctor (or Dad, or me) check the ears again in about two weeks from now to be sure there is no residual infection.
